t: 11 Huge Trending Pet Products (2025 & 2026)
s: 4 weeks ago - A GPS dog fence is a modern solution for pet containment. Instead of using buried wire like a traditional electric fence, the product utilizes satellites and GPS to create a geo-fence for the dog. Some notable brands leading the way in this product category include SpotOn, Halo Collar, and Guardian.
